description: The QUICKEN2017 file is saved in a proprietary format and the file should not be modified or moved after creation. It is saved in the following location by default:
You can export your account information to the .QXF file format. Select File → Export from the menu and save the information in a QXF file.
You can also save a backup of the data in a QUICKEN2017 file as a .QUICKEN2017BACKUP file. This is helpful for securing data in case the QUICKEN2017 file becomes corrupt or is lost.
